amendment.description: Amendment sought to express the sense of Congress concerning support for democracy in Peru and the release of Lori Berenson, an American citizen imprisoned in Peru.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, no. 31, printed in Part B, H.Rept. 106-235 to express the Sense of Congress concerning support for democracy in Peru and the release of Lori Berenson, an American citizen imprisoned in Peru.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Waters amendment was withdrawn.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Waters amendment (A017) Failed by recorded vote: 189 - 234, 5 Present (Roll no. 326).
